passive1.name: Spoils of War
passive1.effects: Grants a charge every 45 seconds, up to 3 charges. Basic attacks can consume a charge to execute minions. Melee basic attacks execute minions below 50% of their maximum health and ranged basic attacks below 30% of their maximum health. Killing a minion by any means with a charge grants you and the nearest allied champion kill gold. These effects require an allied champion to be nearby. Receive diminishing gold from excessive minion kills.

passive2.name: Quest
passive2.effects: Earn 500 using this item to upgrade to Targon's Buckler, gaining the Warding active with 3 wards in stock.

other.limit: Limited to 1 Jungle or Gold Income item.
